page.title: 10LIFE STYLES-Hair Fashions
page.content: Teenagers have many different hair styles. Some shave their heads and they are called skinheads. Others wear their hair very long, and some boys have longer hair than girls. Boys often get their hair permed. Some boys and girls make their hair spikey so that it just stands up on their heads. They use cream or lacquer to keep it in place. Hair is frequently dyed and many colours are used e.g. green, red, blue, black, purple. Sometimes part of the hair is dyed one colour and the other part is dyed a different colour. One of the strangest hairstyles is to shave the head, except for a narrow band of hair stretching from the back of the neck to the forehead. This is grown long, and greased so that it stands up like a large comb.
